item.description:
Dear Cast Members,

During this Dress Rehearsal, we will run through the games that will comprise our first show together as a cast. Please review the show lineup emailed to you before you arrive.

In preparation for this intensive meet, please mentally rehearse the concepts and principles covered over the course of our previous training experiences. In particular, the deliberate wait-then-respond device and pregnant silence are two tools in your improvisational arsenal you should access second nature.

Our upcoming performances will likely be at the Hale Bernard Services for Older People. I am in the process of finalizing our performance date with the senior center.

See you after the New Year!
Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Ensemble A Dress Rehearsal
